name: EZAdventures: Punished Huber Strikes Back!
description:
Punished Huber goes on an EZ Adventure. I made this for the Glinny's Cauldron Jam.

Controls:

Keyboard:
Walk: W,A,S,D
Run: Left Shift
Jump: Space
Reload: R
Crouch: C
Aim: Right Mouse
Shoot: Left Mouse
Equip Weapon (toggle): Q
Change Weapon: Mouse Wheel (up for primary, down for secondary)
Interact: E
Reset Level: Backspace

Controller: (xbox) 
Walk: Left Analogue 
Run: Click Left Thumbstick (L3)
Jump: A button
Reload: X button
Crouch: B button
Aim: Left Trigger
Shoot: Right Trigger
Equip Weapon (toggle): Right Bumper
Change Weapon: Left and Right on the D-Pad
Interact: X button
Reset Level: Back Button

Tips: 

-The more Mountain Dew in your system, the more effective your double jump

-There are 'switches' you can find that allows you to collect coins

-In "The Gauntlet", there's a secret room

-Don't hurt Kyle's favorite Pokemon
